0.1.name: wordpress/destandart
0.1.description:
Replaces "standart" by "standard" and "Euronen", "Teuro", "Teuronen" by Euro.

Probably the weirdest plugin I ever wrote, but somehow the "Standart"-Typo drives me nuts.

This plugin

The 'correction' is done when rendering the comments, not in the database - replacing is hence reversible, by disabling the plugin.
